website_summaries.verdict: Every bit as cozy as it is stylish, this adorable parka sports a well-balanced combination of features to keep pups protected while pleasing trendy pet parents at the same time.
pros: Retractable hood with faux fur trim and jersey sleeves are both practical and stylish
Water-resistant shell deflects light rain and snow
Dual hook-and-loop fasteners ensure a secure fit
Features a nifty storage pocket and a harness opening
cons: We’d prefer it if it fastened on the back rather than the belly
A bit shorter than comparable coats

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey, but otherwise good quality and very cute
customer_reviews.text: I needed a thick jacket for my pup (16 lb cavapoo with long torso and limbs), and this was perfect. Very cute and easy to put on. Hood does not obstruct the hole for the leash in the back. I think it runs slightly small, had to order size 16 when his other clothes fit fine with 14 inch back length measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy coat -outlasted the dog! :-)
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the same coat I bought several years ago. We just loved it and bought another one because the dog grew out of it. So the coat outlasted the dog!! The products from this company are amazing and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Quality ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the coat! Great quality!! Unfortunately I did have to return because my dog is longer than her girth...so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of Canada Pooch for my King Charles Cavalier Puppy. He now has several very cute outfits from you. Elaine and Charlie love bug
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coat for our pug!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fantastic coat! We have had so many issues with jackets in the past for our pug Maximus. They never stayed closed. The Velcro on this is such great quality! He’s about 25 pounds And the 16 length coat fits him so perfectly. Was very excited to find this coat!
customer_reviews.author: Mbarb15

customer_reviews.title: The fleece lining is great. The hood has a snap to hold it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's warm and the belly area of the coat covers more than most other coats out there. The fleece lining is great. The hood has a snap to hold it in place on the back. Wish the sleeves were longer and the black ribbing in the belly area was wider to cover more surface area. But overall this is a great coat, warm, and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Size up. Ordered per the size guides and it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: Spirit9

customer_reviews.title: Warm and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made. Comfortable and warm for her in Northern states. My Chin (pictured) weighs about 7 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Kat the Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This little jacket is a perfect fit and, unlike prior winter coats from other companies, it is well made and warm!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Z

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous dog parka! My doggies love them!
customer_reviews.text: My doggies loved their parkas! They fit so well and look so cute in them! They are high quality and worth the cost
customer_reviews.author: steamin

customer_reviews.title: Chanel
customer_reviews.text: Supper great coat for here in chicago she loves it. Its durable and worm plus looks dope @tattoofreddy ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.author: Freddy D Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Coat
customer_reviews.text: My dog looks adorable in this jacket. I’m sure it is warm too. I actually have bought 2. It also reminds me of Canadian Goose.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen adams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Frenchie
customer_reviews.text: This parka is really nice to have during really cold winter months. My dog doesn't mind it and its really easy to put on. It's also really funny to watch my Frenchie walk around in, we get lots of smiles from drivers passing by :)
customer_reviews.author: CStad

customer_reviews.title: Good Coat
customer_reviews.text: This coat is easy to put on and seals up very well unlike many of the coats I bought in the past. It runs a little small so I had to order it in one size larger than the chart suggested to get a good fit
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat For Pooch
customer_reviews.text: Cute, warm coat for cold winters. Seller provided fast, free shipping
customer_reviews.author: Pussycat66

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful coat. Jealous my dog got one and I don’t !!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Schleider

customer_reviews.title: canada pooch quality never dissapoints!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Canada pooch coat I've purchased for my dogs. they have been washed multiple times and g=hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Cresto

customer_reviews.title: Warm dog = happy dog
customer_reviews.text: Just got this jacket for my dog -- he loves it! Certainly helps when it's single digits outside. Very well-constructed jacket!!
customer_reviews.author: Tomamo

customer_reviews.title: Great coat
customer_reviews.text: Dogs coat came way before the expected date. It was exactly as advertised if not more. Great seller. Great price. Definitely would buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Really cute looking product but horrible design. I have a 7lb yorkiepoo and the Velcro on the chest is so thick and rough!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and very well made! I would make sure to measure your pet. Our pup was a size 12!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He stays warm in his jacket and it's a nice sharp color perfect for walking around in these dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit my barrel-chested frenchie very well, although it is a bit long. He stays warm in his jacket and it's a nice sharp color perfect for walking around in these dark winters.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: SO warm and so stylish!
customer_reviews.text: SO CUTE! And super warm and well made! I was very impressed with this product and look forward to buying their doggie boots soon. Everyone asks where i got this great coat!
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: Can get at Pet suppliez
customer_reviews.text: Great coat. Fits my barrel chested dogs. 2 Velcro tabs for adjusting. Quality. I like it has a hood.
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: Fits my dog perfect. The sizing is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The Quality of this jacket is fabulous. Fits my dog perfect. The sizing is a bit off. I had to buy the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: My boxer stayed cozy .
customer_reviews.text: My boxer looks great an stayed cozy warm. This coat is awesome. Very well made .
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Brand name " Canada Pooch" But will not ship to Niagara falls "Canada " ????? Ridiculous !
customer_reviews.author: Gail

product_meta.title: Canada Pooch | North Pole Dog Parka | Water-Resistant Insulated Dog Jacket
feature_bullets: SIZE AND FIT: For back length, measure from the base of neck to the base of the tail. 12 inches long = Size 12. For dogs with larger than normal chests, double check their size by measuring all the way around the dog under their front legs to their upper back for their chest girth measurement. You may need to go up or down, based on their chest girth. Reference our size chart or reach out for help.
Dual velcro closure. Sleeves for sizes 10-27
Spot clean dirt or machine wash inside out with closure fastened on gentle cycle, cold water. Hang to dry. Do not iron
